languages.text: {n}Не прекращая улыбаться, Люссарий указывает на орла.{/n} "Экипировкой для благородных киберпомощников, конечно. Спрос невелик, ведь подобная роскошь доступна немногим в Империуме, но я счастлив, что нашел свое призвание".

{n}Lussarius points to his eagle, still smiling.{/n} "Equipment for noble cyber-assistants, of course. The demand is modest, as few in the Imperium can afford such luxury, but I am glad to have found my calling."
languages.original_text: {n}Не прекращая улыбаться, Люссарий указывает на орла.{/n} "Экипировкой для благородных киберпомощников, конечно. Спрос невелик, ведь подобная роскошь доступна немногим в Империуме, но я счастлив, что нашел свое призвание".

{n}Lussarius points to his eagle, still smiling.{/n} "Equipment for noble cyber-assistants, of course. The demand is modest, as few in the Imperium can afford such luxury, but I am glad to have found my calling."

languages.text: {n}Lussarius deutet auf seinen Adler, immer noch lächelnd.{/n} "Ausrüstung for edle Cyber-Assistenten, versteht sich. Die Nachfrage ist bescheiden, denn nur wenige im Imperium können sich diesen Luxus leisten, aber ich freue mich, darin meine Berufung gefunden zu haben."
languages.original_text: {n}Lussarius points to his eagle, still smiling.{/n} "Equipment for noble cyber-assistants, of course. The demand is modest, as few in the Imperium can afford such luxury, but I am glad to have found my calling."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lussarius deutet auf seinen Adler, immer noch lächelnd.{/n} "Ausrüstung for edle Cyber-Assistenten, versteht sich. Die Nachfrage ist bescheiden, denn nur wenige im Imperium können sich diesen Luxus leisten, aber ich freue mich, darin meine Berufung gefunden zu haben."

languages.text: {n}Lussarius, toujours souriant, pointe son aigle du doigt.{/n} « Cet équipement est destiné aux nobles cyber-assistants. La demande est plutôt modeste, peu de membres de l'Imperium peuvent se permettre un tel luxe, mais je suis ravi d'avoir trouvé ma vocation. »
languages.original_text: {n}Lussarius points to his eagle, still smiling.{/n} "Equipment for noble cyber-assistants, of course. The demand is modest, as few in the Imperium can afford such luxury, but I am glad to have found my calling."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lussarius, toujours souriant, pointe son aigle du doigt.{/n} « Cet équipement est destiné aux nobles cyber-assistants. La demande est plutôt modeste, peu de membres de l'Imperium peuvent se permettre un tel luxe, mais je suis ravi d'avoir trouvé ma vocation. »

languages.text: {n}卢萨利乌斯指着他的鹰，脸上挂着笑容。{/n}“当然是为帝国真正的贵族准备的生化仆从。这些商品的需求量很小，因为整个帝国很少有人能负担得起这样的奢侈品。不过，我很高兴终于找到了我的使命。”
languages.original_text: {n}Lussarius points to his eagle, still smiling.{/n} "Equipment for noble cyber-assistants, of course. The demand is modest, as few in the Imperium can afford such luxury, but I am glad to have found my calling."

traits.locale_text: {n}卢萨利乌斯指着他的鹰，脸上挂着笑容。{/n}“当然是为帝国真正的贵族准备的生化仆从。这些商品的需求量很小，因为整个帝国很少有人能负担得起这样的奢侈品。不过，我很高兴终于找到了我的使命。”

languages.text: {n}Lussarius señala a su águila sin perder la sonrisa.{/n} «Equipamiento para nobles ayudantes cibernéticos, por supuesto. La demanda es modesta, ya que pocos en el Imperium pueden permitirse este lujo, pero me alegra haber encontrado mi vocación».
languages.original_text: {n}Lussarius points to his eagle, still smiling.{/n} "Equipment for noble cyber-assistants, of course. The demand is modest, as few in the Imperium can afford such luxury, but I am glad to have found my calling."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lussarius señala a su águila sin perder la sonrisa.{/n} «Equipamiento para nobles ayudantes cibernéticos, por supuesto. La demanda es modesta, ya que pocos en el Imperium pueden permitirse este lujo, pero me alegra haber encontrado mi vocación».

languages.text: {n}ルッサリウスは笑みを浮かべたまま、自身の鷲を指さした。{/n}「もちろん、高貴なサイバーアシスタントのための装備です。帝国ではこのような贅沢を享受できる者は少ないので、需要は控えめですが、私は自分の天職を見つけられて嬉しく思っています」
languages.original_text: {n}Lussarius points to his eagle, still smiling.{/n} "Equipment for noble cyber-assistants, of course. The demand is modest, as few in the Imperium can afford such luxury, but I am glad to have found my calling."

traits.locale_text: {n}ルッサリウスは笑みを浮かべたまま、自身の鷲を指さした。{/n}「もちろん、高貴なサイバーアシスタントのための装備です。帝国ではこのような贅沢を享受できる者は少ないので、需要は控えめですが、私は自分の天職を見つけられて嬉しく思っています」

languages.text: {n}Lussarius, gülümsemeye devam ederek kartalını gösteriyor.{/n} "Soylu siber yoldaşlar için teçhizat satıyorum elbette. İmparatorluk'ta bu tarz ürünleri pek azı karşılayabildiğinden talep düşük ancak hâlimden memnunum."
languages.original_text: {n}Lussarius points to his eagle, still smiling.{/n} "Equipment for noble cyber-assistants, of course. The demand is modest, as few in the Imperium can afford such luxury, but I am glad to have found my calling."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lussarius gülümsemeye devam ederek kartalını gösteriyor.{/n} "Soylu siber yoldaşlar için teçhizat satıyorum elbette. İmparatorluk'ta bu tarz ürünleri pek azı karşılayabildiğinden talep düşük ancak hâlimden memnunum."
